title: Digital Marketing Specialist /Content Generator, Administrative Assistant
job_overview:
Overview:
We are seeking a highly motivated and organized individual to serve as a Digital Marketing Specialist and Administrative Assistant. This dual-role position is ideal for someone with a strong understanding of digital marketing strategy and tools, paired with excellent administrative and organizational skills. The ideal candidate will manage digital marketing efforts across multiple companies while supporting day-to-day administrative operations.

Key Responsibilities:

Digital Marketing Duties
 • Develop and implement digital marketing strategies tailored to each company’s goals
 • Manage and grow multiple social media accounts including content scheduling, engagement, and analytics
 • Oversee SEO best practices, website updates, and search engine rankings
 • Create and manage Google Ads and other online advertising campaigns
 • Generate and post high-quality still content using provided images and information
 • Track campaign performance and prepare regular marketing reports

Administrative Duties
 • Handle day-to-day administrative tasks including filing, data entry, document organization, and scheduling
 • Assist in client communication and ensure a high level of customer service
 • Maintain organized records and support operational efficiency across the companies
 • Coordinate meetings, manage calendars, and support logistics for team or client engagements

Qualifications:
 • Proven experience in digital marketing and administrative support
 • Proficiency in social media platforms, Google Ads, SEO tools, and content creation
 • Strong written and verbal communication skills
 • Highly organized, self-motivated, and detail-oriented
 • Ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities efficiently
 • Comfortable working independently and as part of a team
